meanings.definition: A traditional Louisiana sandwich consisting of meat or seafood served on French bread.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious poboys for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves the best poboys in town.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone enjoyed the poboys so much they asked for seconds.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the poboys filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The poboys was so big, I could barely finish it.

meanings.definition: To make or eat a poboy sandwich.
meanings.sent2: She loves to poboys with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: I poboys every time I visit New Orleans; it's a must!
meanings.sent4: After a long day, I like to poboys and relax on the couch.
meanings.sent5: We decided to poboys at the new restaurant in town.
